Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
